author: Adam Savage’s Tested
description:
What are Adam Savage's takeaways from his tattoo experience? What is it like to have people asking questions or making comparisons to work you did years ago? In this live stream excerpt Adam answers these questions from Tested members J Dellarosa and Ozymandias the Bassist, whom we thank for their support. If you've ever gotten a tattoo, what was that experience like? 

Larz: https://www.tattoodo.com/artists/thequietchild
Buy Adam's (temporary) ruler tattoo: https://tested-store.com/products/adam-savages-temporary-ruler-tattoo
What Adam Savage Regrets About His Tattoo: https://youtu.be/1GCy0oOSPYo
Adam Savage Tests His Temporary Ruler Tattoo! https://youtu.be/5kYtfwKXzSQ
How Useful Is Adam Savage's Tattoo? https://youtu.be/c6TopwNu7Ok
Is Adam Savage's Ruler Tattoo Still Accurate? https://youtu.be/-PBVB1PcALk
Why Is Adam Savage's Tattoo TEAL? https://youtu.be/P3OoQ-wZz1w

title: Adam Savage's Takeaways From Getting a Tattoo
